title: Asset Inventory Management
description: The organization shall maintain and document an inventory of physical devices, software platforms, and information assets.

title: Access Control Policy
description: The organization shall define, document, and implement access control policies governing user access to systems and data.

title: Information Protection Processes
description: The organization shall establish and maintain procedures to protect information in accordance with security policies.

title: Security Monitoring
description: The organization shall monitor information systems to identify cybersecurity events and anomalies.

title: Incident Response Planning
description: The organization shall establish and maintain an incident response plan defining roles, responsibilities, and communication processes.

title: Recovery Planning
description: The organization shall implement recovery plans to restore systems and data following cybersecurity incidents.
